website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe refrigerator water filter is rigorously tested to ensure long-lasting performance.
pros: Has been shown to reduce odor and chlorine in water, as well as limit the risk of lead, organic chemicals and asbestos
Intended for use with French door and side-by-side refrigerators
Performs beautifully with a variety of refrigerator brands
cons: May produce cloudy water at times
Water sometimes emits a foul odor after it runs through the filter

customer_reviews.title: If you have cloudy water READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews by people who have cloudy water after installation. I can understand the reason for concern water should be clear. FEAR NOT my h2o fridge friends what you are seeing are TINY bubbles floating in the water. The super fine filtration also creates super fine bubbles until all the water has been purged from the filter. This can take multiple gallons of water running through the filter until the air is all gone! Enjoy your fresh water! Like this <PRO TIP> Click that helpful button!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Tampered with. Sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and inspected the item. This item was sold as new, but clearly was tampered with. See the photos. The seam of my old filter has a clean line and the number matches up with the guiding rail. The replacement I just received looks like it was cut and glued back together. I'm going to try: Aqua Drop filters Certified Compatible Cartridge with Frigidaire water filter ULTRAWF
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: I don't trust that this supposedly new filter came from Frigidaire
customer_reviews.text: Inserted the filter into my 6 months old Frigidaire, ran water through for 3 minutes as instructed, and waited for the cloudy, gray water to clear up. Still gray and cloudy. ran it for 3 more minutes...still gray and cloudy. Tasted the water and noticed a slight sour aftertaste. I put my original filter (came with the new Frigidaire 6 months earlier) and the water came out clear and no aftertaste. I don't trust that this supposedly new filter came from Frigidaire or was new! It wasn't sealed and was loose in the flimsy box. It is in the mail back to Amazon. I'm calling Fridgidaire direct.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: These take a LOT of purging
customer_reviews.text: Normally, these filters work fine but I got TWO bad ones in the same order. When I inserted them and went through the purge routine, there were black bits of something that showed up in the initial water stream. I ran the normal 10-15 pitchers of water to get rid of that "baking soda" aftertaste that is present with new filters. Even after the taste was OK, the water remained cloudy - Really unappealing. The photo shows tap water on the left and the "filtered" water on the right. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mathes

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy water!
customer_reviews.text: My water was fine until I installed this filter. I have flushed gallons and gallons of water through it and the water is still cloudy. Not the full of air kind of cloudy that clears up if you let it sit, but dirty cloudy. Paid top dollar for the name brand filter and it does not work. Note - if I let it sit to try to clear the water, it does not get clear, but there is a film of a chalky white substance left in the bottom of the glass or container. By the time I installed it, it was too late to return, but this filter was faulty. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa97225

customer_reviews.title: Replacement fliter works great
customer_reviews.text: The first filter I ordered was faulty my water wouldn't run off the fridge. I had to call a technician out to check out my fridge and they told me its the filter. I returned it and received a new filter right away, problem solved. The price is great I saved lots of money ordering from here. Its works great and water tastes awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY: this is the second time I've purchased this product. Both times the water flow through the filter slowed down to a trickle within eight weeks of install. There are only two people in my house, myself and my wife, so it's impossible that we're anywhere close to the hundreds of gallons of water filtered as advertised. You're better off with third-party filters, they do just as good of a job but maintain water flow. Don't waste your time with these more expensive filters.
customer_reviews.author: Clay McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Another Cloudy Experience
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy a 3rd party filter for our Frigidaire refrigerator but since it's no longer available on Amazon, we decided to go with the OEM one. We returned the first one since the water continued to come out cloudy even after running a couple gallons of water through it. Unfortunately, the second is exhibiting the same behavior. I've actually got the water to come out clean a few times but only after running a few gallons through it. That success is only short-lived since after a few hours of laying idle, the water returns to it's cloudy ways. I'm not sure what to do next.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good filter, original product
customer_reviews.text: I read a few of the other reviews, stating that the filter they received was not original and looked as it had been tempered with. After arrival of the filter, I thoroughly inspected the filter as well as the packaging. Everything seemed to be in fine order. The filter is installed and performs as expected. Good product, good water.
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally you might get a bad one but overall not bad
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this exact filter on Amazon since I bought my fridge in 2010. I used to love them until my last one. It caused the water to run so slow it was unusable and couldn't make ice. Since I had had such good luck with these filters before (and the filter was brand new), I never suspected it was the issue so I proceeded to replace the inlet valve and other things before finally buying a new filter. Well, it was the filter the whole time. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy after weeks
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I replace my refrigerator filter I run the water for the recommended 5 or so minutes (I usually fill a 5 gallon bucket, use it to water plants). Both OEM and third party filters would be cleared by well before then; it has now been a month since I replaced it and the water is still cloudy (and not bubble cloudy that clears over time, it remains cloudy the next day). Have had no luck getting hold of Frigidaire and of course it's well past the return period so there's not even a link to contact Amazon about it. Will not order again, go with third party companies who rely on quality to maintain their sales.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Berry

customer_reviews.title: quality is question recently
customer_reviews.text: We purchased from this company few times, and until recently, we believe its quality becomes unknown. The first item will cause lot of blur and unclear water output, and returned and exchanged it. But exchanged second item has same issue. We do not know if it was same patch or in general the quality should be as it is. But, we do not feel comfortable and return second one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jadesw

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY..
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT IT TO REPLACE MY OTHER FILTER THAT NEEDED REPLACEMENT BUT SINCE I INSTALLED THIS ONE ALL I BEEN GETTING IS COMPLAINTS FROM THE FAMILY THAT THE WATER TASTE NASTY OR THE ICE CUBES. I WILL HAVE TO REPLACE IT WITH ONE FROM THE STORE AS THEY MIGHT HAVE BEEN SEATING AT THE WAREHOUSE FOR SOMETIME AND THAT MIGHT BE THE REASON ITS GIVING THE BAD TASTE. IT WAS EASY TO INSTALLED AND OK PRICE BUT I SHOULD HAVE GONE WITH THE STORE ONES HERE..
customer_reviews.author: GREG E.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and low pressure
customer_reviews.text: Junk, this thing has terrible water pressure and is leaking all over the inside of my fridge. I have a Frigidaire Gallery model# FGHS2631PF4A. Last time I purchased a cheaper off brand one which had better water pressure and no leaks. Why wouldn't the name brand which costs almost twice as much work better? not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes salty?
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this same product before, the last time about six months ago, without having any issue. This time the drinking water from the refrigerator tastes salty. It's very noticeable, and I don't know whether it's safe to drink. Our regular tap water tastes fine. Very disappointed as this is a Frigidaire branded item and they're not inexpensive. The box design has been updated, so I don't know if the product has too. Update: The unusual taste did disappear after about a week. I now assume that the new product needs more flushing than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!! FAKE
customer_reviews.text: We ran at least two gallons of water through this filter and the water is brownish, murky, and full of particles. It also has a weird smell. I don't think this is a genuine filter, I've never had this issue with the ones I purchased locally. So now I'm stuck with a filter that doesn't work. How am I supposed to get a refund on something that is full of water? Buy these at your local home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time we ordered this water filter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we ordered this water filter from Amazon. I just clicked to repurchase the same product. We installed the new filter last night and the water tastes gross (after dumping lots). What's going on?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. I'm a professional.
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often... But when I do, it's because it must be really awesome or horrible. In this case... Horrible. I am a tech savvy individual and work as an engineer... This filter DOES NOT FUNCTION PROPERLY. My previous filters worked for several months, providing clean water at a nice, fast rate. This filter takes a huge amount of water to purge the system initially, and then it barely allows water to flow after barely a month of use. I don't know how or why this is the quality that they offer... I even ordered a replacement for it being defective, and the "new" one was also poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Pinkhasov

customer_reviews.title: A bit Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why, but the generic brand of water filters for this model, does not taste good. I have tried several generic brand filters in place of this filter, and I always return to Frigidaire's filter. The water tastes excellent, does not smell and lasts a good 6-8 months. If your family is full of athletes or just drink a lot of water, the life span may be 4-6 months. We use ours only for ice now and it lasts a long time. If you want good tasting water and your fridge takes this filter, you can try the generics, but I would recommend the Frigidaire.
customer_reviews.author: Dave'sOP

customer_reviews.title: Please read! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So there are a lot of reviews saying that the water comes out murky and unclear. This is true. You have to flush the air filter until the water becomes clear from the excess minerals and crap in there. For me it was like a gallon of water. And then it went back to the normal crystal clear water. The instructions don't do a very good job neither does the website but you do have to purge a water filter. This product works great and I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Water filter is faulty ?
customer_reviews.text: We installed this water filter as soon as it arrived. The light on the filter was orange/yellow at the time we ordered and installed. After the installation the light never turned green ? Instructions mentioned it might take a few times before the light would change from yellow to green - it was never changed to green - we checked the installation & it looks right - we have done this installation before. We think the filter was faulty to begin with - do we have any recourse on this order - thank you for your help. jennifer kesterson
customer_reviews.author: jennifer k

customer_reviews.title: Low water flow rate
customer_reviews.text: The water filter works just fine does it’s job. But as soon as I installed it it seemed like the water wasn’t flowing as strongly as it was with my previous filter. When I got around to needing a new filter, I ordered a different brand and conducted a quick test for it. Lo and behold, this Frigidaire filter does indeed put out water at a slower rate. Filling up my 24oz water bottle took 44 seconds with this filter, and only 31 seconds with the new off-brand filter. So if you’re getting impatient using this Frigidaire filter like I was, maybe consider a looking at a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: jasonjourneyman

customer_reviews.title: Slowed to a crawl within days.
customer_reviews.text: We don't have great water, but all of these filters I've bought before would last at least a month before slowing to a trickle and needing replacement. This one started slow and got slower. By the end of a week it took 2 minutes to fill a glass of water. The price has jumped up 20% and the product usefulness has dropped 80%. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: ACarriuolo

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay in when installing: try this!
customer_reviews.text: I removed mine to look at it and could not get it to click back in place. After trying everything I read online and having no luck I ordered another one. And then I tried one more time. My Frigidaire has a door/cover on one side of the filter housing, I took that off. There’s just enough room behind the housing to fit a finger in there. There is a little plastic lever of some sort behind where the filter sits, push or pull that just a bit while gently sliding the filter into place, it will click and you can cancel your replacement order like I did. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: DaveTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Water filter
customer_reviews.text: I have just got the second filter and it was bad just like the first one. I wish I had read the reviews before I ordered them. This one is bad as well. No matter how long you run the water thru it still remains cloudy with the white specs all thru it. I should of went to the local Frigidaire dealer to buy the filter. Great lesson learned!!! You cannot TRUST Amazon with everything. I order from their all my household supplies and normally I am very pleased. However, this is not a Frigidaire water filter. I have used them for 3 years now, and these 2 are the only problems I have ever had. Shame on you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: curfew

customer_reviews.title: Funky tastes and cloudiness
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased this filter multiple times and never had a problem until this most recent time. Installation is simple, you've got to cycle it and run the water blah blah blah. Not my first rodeo. However, this filter is definitely off this time - - the water is not as clear as normal, and it tastes like chemicals. We drink water from our fridge religiously, so we're used to our tap water taste...but this filter is definitely leaving a distinct chemical in our water. We're resorting back to bottle water until this filter gets replaced...AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: Not PureSource 3 but it works and fits, no problem
customer_reviews.text: My fridge required the PureSource 3, and I ordered this on accident. The ultra source is larger but still fit and does the job fine. It is going to be cloudy at first, you have to give the filter time to purge the old water and run through the filter cycle. Fill a gallon jug a few times before consuming water and you’ll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Generic better
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying replacement water filters for several years for my Frigidaire refrigerator. Always an off brand, with few problems. When the pandemic hit and everyone was on a buying frenzy i was unable to find inexpensive replacements. I was forced to buy an actual Frigidaire water filter. Awful! I will admit it was easy to install and had no leaks. However, even after 15 minutes of flushing the water through the filter, and for several days after, the water was cloudy. As I paid nearly $40 for a single filter I am extremely disappointed. I only hope the frenzy has ended and I won't have to purchase a Frigidaire product again.
customer_reviews.author: jbanfi

customer_reviews.title: Second review - is as I expect
customer_reviews.text: Second review. I have added 4 stars because the weak evaluation previous was based on a slow delivery time. Turns out the filter was delivered as recorded but placed in the garage in an unusual place. Not a problem. Amazon continues there wonderful delivery record. Filter fits my Frigidaire FGUB2642LE7 and has cured my leak.
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just pricey.
customer_reviews.text: The filter works great. I ran water throw the filter until all air was out, and the charcoal was no longer discharging gray matter. I’d estimate that to be approximately a gallon of water. After that life is good for the next six months. I’d personally like to spend $20 for a filter, but at least it’s not $50-60. I’ve used generic filters in the past, and not only are they cheaper they work exactly the same. Honestly the only reason I bought the Frigidaire brand filter was nothing else was available. Besides the price gouging I’m happy with the filter and it’s performance.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my dog
customer_reviews.text: There was a bitter taste in the water for several days after installation, but it either faded or I became accustomed to it. The one main reason I'm looking for a replacement is because I have an all white dog who has been getting tear stains since I changed the filter: my vet said the strains are typical from the water being high in iron or other metals/minerals. I'd been using Crystala for past few years and all staining went away, but they unfortunately appear to no longer available in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to find the the filter for my fridge on amazon. However, I am stubborn and refuse to buy it from anywhere else haha. This is good and works but I have noticed that the water comes out a bit slower than my previous filter. Unfortunately my previous one is no longer sold on amazon. UPDATED - a month later, it has gotten even slower. It will literally take you a minute to fill a glass of water. Thank god my return window did not close!! I would have wasted $40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON HAS WHAT YOU NEED.
customer_reviews.text: These Filters ARE EXPENSIVE!!! So when I found out that Amazon had them and at A GREAT PRICE IT WAS A NO BRAINER. So this is the ONLY Place that I will purchase This Filter, and the COOL THING IS ALL I HAVE TO DO IS TELL Alexa to order IT!!! NOW THAT'S SERVICE AT IT'S FINEST. I looked at other reviews and they complain about the water filter!!! IT'S NOT THE FILTER!!! IT'S FROM YOUR CITY WATER!!! COME ON, THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE FILTER.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Fine replacement, but beware of water spray on first use
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy replacement. They should add a note to the installation instructions that you should put a towel on the floor in front of your fridge when first dispensing water after changing the filter. I grabbed a quart size measuring cup to run the recommended 1.5 gallons of water through the new filter before using it for drinking. I was surprised when I first hit the dispenser, water sprayed everywhere onto my kitchen floor propelled by the air that was inside the new filter. If I had known, I would have proactively put a towel down to avoid a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This item was defective. The water in the refrigerator ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was defective. The water in the refrigerator continued to come out very slow and the ice was insufficiently made after installing this filter I received through Amazon. I thought something was wrong with my refrigerator since this was a new filter. The repairman could find nothing wrong and suggested I replace the filter again. Sure enough, I replaced the filter with one I bought at Lowe's and the water is flowing and ice is being made. Now it is too late to return the filter I purchased through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fit my fridge - be sure to prime the filter
customer_reviews.text: It fit my fridge, which was my main concern. I can't really tell a difference in the taste of the water but I'm choosing to believe that it is filtering well. Be sure to prime the filter by running the water from the fridge for about 3 straight minutes, or a gallon. There were lots of sputters and blasts and even some little filter pieces that came through (not sure if that's from the old filter or the new one) but it is running smoothly now. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes like rotten fish
customer_reviews.text: I installed this filter and followed the directions to run 2 gallons of water through it before drinking the water. From the get go the water tasted like fish as I neared the bottom of a glass of water. I have run another 4 gallons through the filter to purge it, and the water still tastes fishy. This is either a knockoff, or very old, or poorly stored by the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd Stream

customer_reviews.title: Filter Failed to Work after First Day - But Amazon Support Shined
customer_reviews.text: Filter was easy to install and even worked well for a bit. However the next day the water was spitting out instead of a nice flow. In addition the water was very cloudy indicating an issue with the new filter. I put the old one back in and everything was fine. I will not order this filter from this vendor again. I decided to change my review. Yes I was disappointed in the first unit delivered, but Amazon stepped up to the plate. After speaking to customer support, Amazon sent an immediate replacement which worked perfectly. Kudos goes to Amazon support. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Fridigaire and meets more standards
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to read the specs. This one is more money than the knock offs but there is a reason for the higher price - quality and performance. This one is Tested and certified by NSF International against NSF/ANSI Standards 42, 53 and 401 The other cheaper filters only do one of those standards. The bottom line s the more standards it meets, the more stuff it filters out and the more pure/clean the water you are drinking and making ice with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Somethings fishy ??
customer_reviews.text: Yes it was a great value for the money but it didn’t last no where near as long as the one I bought from Lowe’s. This one lasted from Oct to the end of Dec. it’s suppose to last at least 6 months and the first one we bought from Lowe’s lasted 9 months before the change light came on. Not sure why this one didn’t last but a few months and the ones (same as this) from Lowe’s last like they’re suppose to. I won’t be buying from here because even tho the value is good, it’s not when you have to purchase a new one from Lowe’s way too soon for $50 that’ll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several of these from Frigidaire but this last one was through Amazon. Same filter, same box etc. water is cloudy-dirty after several gallons purged. Amazon tech said she would get back to me after she was able to contact manufacturer, then sent an email telling me to call back if manufacturer didn’t resolve problem...???! I will contact Frigidaire (manufacturer). Wasted time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ledd

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for my old filter.
customer_reviews.text: You have to have it if you want filtered water out of your fridge. You could buy a knock-off brand but I prefer to go with what the refrigerator was designed for. Swapping these is as easy as push-in, remove the old one, push-in the new one until locked and done. You do need to run 1.5 gallons of water through it to prime it...but other than that...it's simple! Not sure how long this should last but we shall see. I dropped a star because this thing is pretty pricey for being a water filter. I know, I know...it's proprietary technology...but that's why I avoid buying Apple products!
customer_reviews.author: ellzTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Makes it six months.  Longer than the standard filter.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I guess we bought the short filter which only lasted about a month in a half. This one is quite a bit longer so I will see how long it goes. Probably just buy this one and avoid the others. Dang thing is like printer ink for how expensive it is. Come on guys. No wonder Fridgeaire is having problems. Update: These last about six months of considerable use. When you first plug it in, it does take a couple of big cups to clear the water. You'll know when it needs replacing because the ice cubes will become hollow and the water slows down on dispensing.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: Dont worry, it's a good filter
customer_reviews.text: I was crazy hesitant to buy this filter because of the bad reviews I read. But out of this being the only filter out there...I didn't have much if an option but to purchase it. I'm pleasantly surprised and happy about it. I've ran about 5 gallons through, and the water is clear and tastes clean. I will say that the water pressure is a little crazy strong now. It's like filling my glass up with a high pressure water gun lol. Overall I would recommend this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: The first filter had clear water this one is murky
customer_reviews.text: So I know you need to drain like a gallon of water after you install a brand new filter before drinking it, but after a week or two you would think the water runs clear, but not with this filter it is still cloudy, this sucks, the last filter I bought the water was nice and clean and crisp, I don't think that box was red, so did they change the product, did a bait an switch on us
customer_reviews.author: Gregski

customer_reviews.title: Filter is fine but the price is absurd
customer_reviews.text: I think they are basing the price on what you'd spend on a comparable amount of bottled water. It's impossible that the filter cost so much to make that they have to charge nearly $50. It's a trap for anyone who didn't do enough research and ended up with a Frigidaire refrigerator. Even on Amazon the price fluctuates nearly $10 up or down within a 12 month period. It's frustrating. -- Amazingly it's actually cheaper directly from the manufacturers website.
customer_reviews.author: fave#13

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this. The water came out completely murky and milky looking. It tasted like bleach! I’m done. It seems like every single thing I get from Amazon that is perishable or drinkable or Edible becomes damaged in someway.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weak stream for expensive name brand
customer_reviews.text: There were several ULTRAWF knock off brands on Amazon that worked great and were reasonably priced, but they no longer seem to be available. This Frigidaire one work ok, but the stream is very weak compared to others we’ve tried over the past 5 years and this is also the most expensive one. We’ve moved back to getting water out of the tap.
customer_reviews.author: sikulas

customer_reviews.title: Open box twice!
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero, 1st box came open and I thought “oh well maybe they missed it” second box had the top completely ripped off. I don’t know what happened to those filters and they aren’t sealed, those caps can be put back on so I was not cool with using these.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend finding an alternative
customer_reviews.text: Took a lot longer than other filters (and longer than what was said in the manual) to get it to run clear. For a while would consistently run for 5 to 8 seconds clear before producing a milky white colored water for a few seconds then going back. The water does not taste as good as it did before and after i open my kids sippy cups after an overnight, the water smells foul. Will be looking for something different next time (if there is anything - this is just another strike against this Frigidaire refrigerator - meh!).
customer_reviews.author: NickB

customer_reviews.title: Water tasted much better with the old filter
customer_reviews.text: Water tasted much better with the old filter. The new filter I flushed it as recommended and kept flushing it. Still is cloudy and tastes weird. The water is fed from MY under counter RO system I know it's not the water. Something in that filter changed it? I could of bought the cheaper generic I said better go with the original. Well there you have it next time order the cheap replacement can't be any worse.
customer_reviews.author: Meched

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated water, over 600ppm!
customer_reviews.text: The filter is pretty easy to install but that's where it stops. I performed the recommended 15 pitchers of water flushed through the filter until the water came out clear. The water taste fine, there is no sour taste and smell. I waited one day to do a water test and the results were over 600ppm. The max level of contaminates for drinking water should be under 50ppm. My tap water was under 400ppm. Bottle water was 7ppm. This is not a good filter.
customer_reviews.author: RiccRocc

customer_reviews.title: Milky water and Low flow
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months of use, and we are unable to use the filter due to its low flow. It takes over a min to get 500 ml of water. Even though my fridge still states that the filter is good, I'm not able to use it, so getting a different replacement already. FYI, the problem existed long before. I just ran out of patience. On top, the water is not very clear either.
customer_reviews.author: Dillan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Ran the water for a few minutes and emptied out the ice tray. First batch of ice had a weird almost vegetable type of taste. Dumped that ice out and it's been great ever since. Fresh ice and water. The old one wasn't replaced for a few years so maybe that's why I had that little ice issue but I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angel L.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot give this a good rating. If there was less than a one-star ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this a good rating. If there was less than a one-star rating I would have used it. I have bought three of these at almost $40. per each and they have not lasted even one month. These are definitely substandard filters. I have always trusted Amazon to protect me from getting less than I paid for. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Think I got a bad filter.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on 8-2-2020. By the end of September the water was running so slow out of the fridge that I wouldnt even use it for water. Replaced filter on 10-13-2020. Problem solved. No new builds or other water supply problems that could have plugged it up... Never had any problems before. So I have to believe the filter went bad.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo Darryl 3

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a home where the previous homeowner had a knockoff filter for the Frigidaire Gallery fridge. Replaced it with this one and to my delight now the drinking water is flowing as expected. Love that it showed up 3 hours after I placed the order. And by the way, I'm glad I ignored the negative reviews and accusations of this one being fake.
customer_reviews.author: Lad

customer_reviews.title: They don't last long
customer_reviews.text: For the price these things sure do not last very long. I have a carbon water filter in my water softener so you wouldn't think these would be working overtime, and yet they go bad fairly quick. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Almostunbiased

customer_reviews.title: Failed 2 times. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Received a second filter after returning the first one. Followed directions exactly. I ran 1.5 gallons through it. 1 week later same results Cloudy murky water. Same as the first filter. The taste is off. Maybe a little chaulky flavor. It’s looks like an official brand but maybe it’s just a good knock off. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Venizelos

customer_reviews.title: Can I return this??
customer_reviews.text: My water tastes bad with this filter in it. I need to return this or try another kind. My husband doesn't really mind it but I do. My sister noticed it too. I thought my off taste was in my head because I'm pregnant but my sister confirmed it. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: oreo2010

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!! Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item, my ice maker isn't working properly after installing this filter which is the correct match to my original filter yet absolutely ruining my freezer and now i have tge hassel of a return and will be filterless with no ice until I can get a new filter and hopefully my icemaker isn't permanently broken!! Everything was fine until i used this filter, I am absolutely livid!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: Chose this one over the more expensive one found at the Big Box stores. Took less than a minute to pull out the OEM filter and install this one. No leaks and it is working perfectly after two months. Highly satisfied, saved gas money from having to go to the hardware store, cheaper through Amazon and of course it was delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This filter does not reduce the PPM in the water...
customer_reviews.text: I checked the PPM in the refrigerator water before I added the filter, flushed the system after installing the new filter and the checked the PPM and there was no change at all. You would think that a new filter would bring the PPM numbers down from the amount that was coming out of the waterline but it did not... so it's definitely a waste of money and time....
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Seems kind of pricey. I could've saved about 5 bucks by going with an off-brand compatible filter. Probably wouldn't matter either way, but because the water we drink is critically important I decided to go with original equipment. It slides right in and fits perfectly. All one has to do is take a moment to read the simple installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: MrTools

customer_reviews.title: Fits but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Why are these filters so expensive? At least this one was a better deal, that’s why I ordered it! Our water and ice do not taste quite as good as it did with the last filter though. Also, at first the water flowed well & after a week of installation the stream got weaker & continues to weaken. That happened before and to fix it we put in a new filter, but this time it happened WAY too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Did the cost of charcoal go up?
customer_reviews.text: How does this go from ~$37 to ~$49? Basically just exploiting people's fear, uncertainty, and doubt. The truth of the matter is, we live in a developed country. Specifically, where I live, our water comes from aquafirs where the water tests as clean AF. However, this stupid refrigerator doesn't work without a filter installed. I appreciate that many people need to filter their water, that's fine, but it shouldn't cost $50.
customer_reviews.author: xopher

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: I got less than 1 month of use from this filter before it got to the point that the water flow was so slow it would take nearly 2 minutes to fill a glass. I should have returned it when I noticed the flow was not as good as the filter I replaced, but at the time I assumed it would get better after I Purged it some more. Frigidaire should not be charging a premium for filters that perform worse than their generic knock off competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Big C

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy water after dozens of gallons
customer_reviews.text: Installed this over a month ago. Have been using the water, it tastes slightly tap-watery, but not bad. Water is still coming out cloudy.... no way it's still bubbles from filter priming. I got it when it was on sale for $30, but they're regularly $49. Maybe it was a bad batch and they were clearing them out?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who's a dummy?
customer_reviews.text: No way was I going to pay $100 for a stupid water filter, but when the battery died on my Dyson and I didn't want to pay $100+ dollars for that either and found an off-brand one that works even better, it occurred to me there might be off-brand fridge water filters... and here it is! Fits perfectly and it DOES make a BIG difference. So there, dummy.
customer_reviews.author: PinkMango

customer_reviews.title: RIP off, doesn't filter the water even when fridge reads filter good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to think of this. I bought a zero water filter that has the tester in it. The water from my fridge and coming thru this filter reads 307 ppm which is only 3 ppm less than out of my kitchen faucet. The zero water filter literally says 0 ppm when tested and tastes way cleaner. So I'm thinking this filter must be a rip off. I wouldn't have known until I bought the zero water filter. These are pretty pricey to get scammed on.
customer_reviews.author: Momof7

customer_reviews.title: stick to the generic much better
customer_reviews.text: Restricted my flow terribly enough that the ice maker waterline freezes up now from the repairman we put in the old generic one and the flow was tremendously different as I remember it to be very disappointed and I had to pay somebody $85 to tell me something I already kind of had figured I thought that a Frigidaire part would be better but unfortunately it's just a flower with Frigidaire including the ice maker and its seal which is also been replaced and still didn't solve the ice maker problem but the water filter sure does stay with generic folks paying the price for Frigidaire is not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the cheaper replacements
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper replacement water filter for our Frigidaire Gallery refrigerator. When it was time to replace it, it got stuck and absolutely would not come out even after I watched several YouTube videos. I finally bought a replacement Water Filter Base unit and removed both the old one and the (attached) cheap filter. Do not settle for replacement filters for these refrigerators. You may save a few dollars, but you may end up like me.
customer_reviews.author: Crankmeister

customer_reviews.title: bad Filter
customer_reviews.text: 6 month ago we bought this same Filter, and when it is time to change(every 6 month) we bought the same one. Now as we were going to take the old one out we could not budge it. For days we tried. Finally had to call the Frigidaire Service Man, and he had to take the while back out to get this Filter out. It had an extra peg sticking out where the two connections are. It cost us $ 71.00. So hopefully we will have better luck with this one, because we did not know what was going on. Would have never bought this one had we known.
customer_reviews.author: gisela

customer_reviews.title: Water cloudy even after purging for 8 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing these filter for a few years now and they always take a while to purge and get the water from looking cloudy. With this one I’ve done double or triple the amount I would usually have to do and the water is still cloudy.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Bad after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months water is starting to taste different and slower coming out. I’ve replaced filter several times with after market filters so I don’t know why this factory filter is worse. Now there is a bunch of 1 star reviews saying same thing. This company needs to give everyone there money back cause there selling bad filters. I noticed when I first installed filter it didn’t put out dirty water like they usually do. Usually you have to run a few cups through new filter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Extremely overpriced for what it is. Nothing special, plastic tube, rubber bushings, filtration material. These should be $10 tops but they have you over a barrel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glogowski

customer_reviews.title: Works for my Kenmore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the connections appeared exactly the same as my kenmore model 253.7, and the kenmore filters were no longer available. This was cheaper and it even pressurized better than the original kenmore water filter. Water tastes like nothing, so I'd say the filter works pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: happicamper88

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 6 stars ....
customer_reviews.text: I always keep one filter on hand so I can change them out and order a new one and not worry when the replacement will arrive. I ordered this filter about 10:30 am and it was at my door by 4:30 pm that same day. It was actually less than 6 hours from order to delivery. OUTSTANDING service.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had to run a bit more water through than it said to clear the cloudiness but that wasn’t a big deal. Water tastes good and flow is great. I had no idea how much our water flow had slowed until I put in the new filter. I guess we were way overdue. I will go ahead and buy another to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement filter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the water filter in my Frigidaire refrigerator it is the exact size and works fine and the water flows through great I hadn’t changed the filter in a year and a half so where there was a trickle now the water is coming out and I’m good for the next six months at least.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the off brand filters, but this was the only one that was available. I flushed over 3 gallons of water through it, never had any debris like I usually do and the water tastes terrible, I am stuck with this filter so I will have to hope it gets better or we get used to the off taste.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Y.

customer_reviews.title: It is not air because the dirty color will not dissipate at all
customer_reviews.text: I have had this filter in my refrigerator for over three weeks and the water is still cloudy. It is not air because the dirty color will not dissipate at all. I am very disappointed I spent the extra money on an OEM water filter and this is what I ended up with. Tap water on the left. "Filtered" water on the right.
customer_reviews.author: New Home Owner

customer_reviews.title: The filter wasn't sealed + very cloudy water
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy third parties filters for my Frigidaire but since my usual brand wasn't available I bought this 'original" Frigidaire filter. Not only it arrived unsealed in just a cardboard package without any additional plastic seal, it makes my water cloudy. Maybe someone used it before me, then returned as a new? I'll go back to Chrystala.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: This filter works in Kenmore Elite
customer_reviews.text: Sears no longer sells their brand water filters for the Kenmore Elite which we had bought because it is a close match in style to the Frigidaire Gallery appliances in our new home. The Gallery refrigerator was on back order. The filters are the same, so the Frigidaire filter fits perfect in the Kenmore and is $15 less. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Garry Russell

customer_reviews.title: pricey but works
customer_reviews.text: compared to older ones I got, this one's water comes out clean from the first drop. I still ran a gallon before actually drinking it. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Chao

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a difference
customer_reviews.text: The filter light on my refrigerator was still green, but I realized it had been about 4 years since I'd changed the filter. After I replaced the filter, I could hear a gushing noise - it was water flowing through the filter. This time I put a date on the end of the filter
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for less than 2 months and water is barely flowing out. I’d love to think it’s just doing such a good job filtering but it’s really useless if it takes 5 minutes to fill a glass of water. Unfortunately it wasn’t an inexpensive purchase so money wasted. The original filter that came with the fridge was nothing like this product. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreaj8

customer_reviews.title: Possibly used before
customer_reviews.text: The filter was installed and I ran the water through it for the required 2 minutes. This was either already used or defective because it hardly let's water through the line. It is so slow it takes 2 minutes to fill a glass. It was never right to start with.
customer_reviews.author: robert craig mixon

customer_reviews.title: Possible Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Like all the other comments you read, this item creates cloudy water that tastes like chlorine. The filter did not fit right in the fridge, because the water coming out of the door kept squirting as if the pressure was incorrect. After further analysis, I pushed in the filter (to remove) and water came squirting out all over the inside of the fridge. Something is not right about this, please do not waste your time by buying this defective filter. It is the same price on the actual Frigidaire website and they offer free shipping. While it may or may not be there in two days like Prime, it will be the authentic filter.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S. M. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Necessary expensive evil.
customer_reviews.text: These things are ridiculously expensive but you have to have them. I wish the company would recycle them as they are a lot of waste going into our environment. Be sure to read the directions thoroughly, we didn't turn off the water first and then the old one wouldn't come out of the refrigerator. It filters like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Coloring Book AddictTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Why are these not sealed like the REAL Fridgidaire filter.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this one for a couple weeks now. The water tastes bad. The package was not Factory Sealed. Ordered two new ones direct from Frigidaire about same cost. They were Factory sealed. Tastes great! Were these customer returns?? For what ever reason??? Seems fishy.
customer_reviews.author: N9LYA

customer_reviews.title: Blocked my water from working!
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying off-brand filters and the last one didn’t last as long as I would expect so I decided to pay the price for the Frigidaire brand to compare. Well I won’t do that again! My ice is kind of melty and the water doesn’t even work. No water comes out at all. You can hear it trying to work, but nope. So I removed the filter to see if I had installed it wrong and a bunch of water came out of the filter housing and dripped from the filter itself. I’m ordering my old off-brand type now and will stick with that going forward!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Gebbia

customer_reviews.title: Bough 2, both did not work
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these before from Amazon and they worked fine. I bought one in April and it didn't work so I had to mail the faulty one back to try another one, but that one also didn't work. I didn't bother mailing back the second one. I won't try to order from Amazon again, I'll just get them from my appliance store
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Gallien

customer_reviews.title: Every product should be this good.
customer_reviews.text: There's a special place in my heart for products that I never want to have to think about & the product lets me never have to think about it. This is such a product. I want clean water & I have clean water. I didn't think twice about the cost or installing it or anything. I forgot that I even bought this, but I drink water every day. Every product should be this good.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT HERE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS ABSOLUTELY DOESN'T WORK! I FLUSHED SO MUCH WATER THROUGH AND THE WATER IS CLOUDY AND YUCKY. I WOULDN'T EVEN GIVE IT TO MY PRECIOUS DOG. AMAZON USED TO DISPLAY A TELEPHONE NUMBER TO SPEAK WITH THEM, BUT THEY WANTED ME TO SEND THE WATER FILTER (WET) BACK TO THEM ACROSS THE COUNTRY. MAKES NO SENSE. BY THE WAY, NO CUSTOMER SERVICE TELEPHONE NUMBER AND I LOOKED. IT'S OBVIOUSLY A DEFECTIVE PRODUCT THEY BOUGHT FROM THE MANUFACTURER.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: I now have ice!/Strange taste
customer_reviews.text: ***Updated**** Noticing a strange taste This is great! I haven’t had ice or water in my house since I moved in and part of the reason is because the filter just needed to be changed. Water taste greats and the filter is affordable!
customer_reviews.author: katie garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Filter fits my fridge perfectly. I haven't had any problems with the water that comes through the filter. Tested the filtered water with a TDS tester and the results do show it works! The water pre filtered was in range of healthy, the filter dropped the TDS down by 20 points.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Quality has degraded over the years.
customer_reviews.text: Flow rate lasted over six months when I first had the fridge but it has gotten worse with new purchases to a point where it now lasts barely a month. After a month, the fridge automatically stops when pouring water into a 64oz growler because it is flowing so slow. Amazon was generous to send a replacement but I'm now having the same problem as others with cloudy water even after a few days. Definitely not air bubbles as it remains cloudy even overnight. Not sure how to submit photos.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: I got seven years out of the original
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are damn good filters. By the time I break down the price over the number of years of use this costs virtually nothing. Hoping this filter lasts as long as the original. If it doesn't I'll update. Purchased in June of 2020.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePeg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Always a perfect replacement. 2nd one I’ve purchased of the same brand. When you install it make sure you push through at least a gallon of water to get rid of the bubbles. It’ll clear up in no time. The bubbles look like sand because they are so small and so many. It’s just air bubbles though. You’ll have crystal clear water in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Comedian

product_meta.title: Frigidaire ULTRAWF PureSource Ultra Water Filter, Original, White, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Keep safe, great tasting water flowing with PureSource Ultra II water filters. Look for our berry-colored design with our new Genuine Filters seal on the package to know for certain your filter is authentic. Frigidaire Genuine Filters – the smarter, safer choice.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Frigidaire ULTRAWF Pure Source Ultra Refrigerator Water Filters.
feature_bullets: Enjoy fresh tasting water right from the fridge and directly in your glass with the PureSource Ultra water filter. Designed to remove harmful contaminants giving you peace of mind with every glass

The PureSource Ultra ULTRAWF is designed with a carbon-based filter to improve your water by removing the odor and taste of chlorine for smoother drinking, making it easy to keep the whole family hydrated
Take a sip and relax as you let your filter get to work reducing impurities found in common tap water such as lead, nitrates, pesticides, and mercury for worry free water at home

Your refrigerator’s reminder light does not turn off automatically. Most reminder lights are reset by pressing and holding the Water Filter button on the dispenser control for 3 seconds. When the display changes from red to green, the status has been reset
Frigidaire Genuine Filters are certified by the Water Quality Association to WQA/ASPE/ANSI S 803 for sustainability.
Tested and certified by NSF International against NSF/ANSI Standards 42, 53 and 401. For details, see Performance Data sheet.
We have refreshed our packaging! Look for our berry-colored design with our new Genuine Filters seal on the package to know for certain your filter is authentic and sold by Frigidaire.
Always consult your Use & Care Guide and run water through the dispenser for 3 minutes, or 1.5 gallons, to prime the filter before use. Discard the water.

The ULTRAWF water filter is easy to install. Push to release the old filter. Push the new filter in until it clicks into place. Run water through the new filter for 3 minutes to prime it. Discard the water or use it to water plants.
